alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 4:58PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Flagler, Marion and southern Putnam Counties through 600 PM EST... At 458 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort McCoy, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, Citra, Lynne and Lake Delancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam
